column1: Nippes (Haitian Creole: Nip) is one of the ten departments (the highest-level political subdivisions) of Haiti. It is the most recently created department
column2: having been split from Grand'Anse in 2003. The capital of the department is Miragoâne.

column1: The department of Nippes is subdivided into three arrondissements (districts)
column2: which are further subdivided into eleven communes (the equivalent of a city or municipality).
